1.1.name: wordpress/buddypress-widget-pack
1.1.description:
Buddypress Widget Pack is a series of 4 widgets that you can add to your Buddypress-enabled sidebar. The four widgets are: 1)Popular Members widget 2)Newest Members Widget 3)Random Members Widget, and 4)Total Friends and Friend Connections Widget

Credit needs to be given to WPMU.org and Sarah Gooding for a majority of the code, as I just widget-ized it ;) Please see the original tutorials by Sarah, here: http://wpmu.org/display-friend-count-and-recent-connections-in-the-buddypress-sidebar/ http://wpmu.org/how-to-create-a-gallery-of-members-avatars-in-buddypress/

Features include: 1. Popular Members widget 2. Newest Members widget 3. Random Members widget 4. Total Friends and Friend Connections Widget
